mapper.sql: select router_id, route_name, begin_name, end_name, status, image_url, core, flag, create_date, update_date from quest_router
mapper.insert:
insert into quest_router
router_id, route_name, begin_name, end_name, status, image_url, core, flag, create_date, update_date,
#{routerId}, #{routeName}, #{beginName}, #{endName}, #{status}, #{imageUrl}, #{core}, #{flag}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate},
mapper.delete:
delete from quest_router where router_id in
#{routerId}
mapper.select: SELECT e.router_id,d.user_id,e.route_name,e.image_url,e.core,e.create_date,d.sumGrade FROM quest_router e,( SELECT a.router_id, a.user_id, SUM(CAST(a.answer AS SIGNED)) AS sumGrade FROM quest_question c INNER JOIN quest_answer a ON c.issue_id = a.issue_id INNER JOIN quest_router_user b ON a.router_id = b.router_id AND c.router_id = b.router_id WHERE b.flag = 0 AND b.status = 1 AND c.answer_type = 1 GROUP BY a.router_id, a.user_id ORDER BY a.router_id) AS d WHERE e.router_id = d.router_id;

SELECT e.router_id,e.route_name,e.image_url,e.core,e.create_date,d.total FROM quest_router e, (SELECT a.router_id, COUNT(DISTINCT a.user_id) AS total FROM quest_question c INNER JOIN quest_answer a ON c.issue_id = a.issue_id INNER JOIN quest_router_user b ON a.router_id = b.router_id AND c.router_id = b.router_id WHERE b.flag = 0 AND b.status = 1 GROUP BY a.router_id ORDER BY a.router_id) AS d WHERE e.router_id = d.router_id;

SELECT d.router_id,e.route_name,e.image_url,e.core,e.create_date, AVG(d.sumGrade) AS avgGrade FROM quest_router e,( SELECT a.router_id, a.user_id, SUM(CAST(a.answer AS SIGNED)) AS sumGrade FROM quest_question c INNER JOIN quest_answer a ON c.issue_id = a.issue_id INNER JOIN quest_router_user b ON a.router_id = b.router_id AND c.router_id = b.router_id WHERE b.flag = 0 AND b.status = 1 AND c.answer_type = 1 GROUP BY a.router_id, a.user_id ) d WHERE e.router_id = d.router_id GROUP BY d.router_id

SELECT AVG(d.sumGrade) AS avgGrade FROM ( SELECT a.router_id, a.user_id, SUM(CAST(a.answer AS SIGNED)) AS sumGrade FROM quest_question c INNER JOIN quest_answer a ON c.issue_id = a.issue_id INNER JOIN quest_router_user b ON a.router_id = b.router_id AND c.router_id = b.router_id WHERE b.flag = 0 AND b.status = 1 AND c.answer_type = 1 GROUP BY a.router_id, a.user_id ) d

SELECT d.router_id, d.user_id, c.issue_id, c.problem_type, c.type_weight, c.problem, c.answer_type, c.garde, c.answer FROM quest_router_user d INNER JOIN ( SELECT b.router_id AS router_id, b.user_id AS user_id, b.issue_id AS issue_id, a.problem_type AS problem_type, a.type_weight AS type_weight, a.problem AS problem, a.answer_type AS answer_type, a.garde AS garde, b.answer AS answer FROM quest_question a INNER JOIN quest_answer b ON a.issue_id = b.issue_id ) AS c ON d.router_id = c.router_id AND d.user_id = c.user_id WHERE d.router_id=1 AND d.user_id=1;
